conclusion: Analyze the flow pattern step by step to determine which container the liquid will flow into.
The baffles are the rectangular shapes with arrows indicating the direction of flow.
The arrows on the baffles point to the right.
The liquid flows out from the left side of the baffles and then into the right side of the baffles.
A, B, C, and D are areas on the left side of the baffles.
E and F are areas on the right side of the baffles.
Since the liquid flows out from the left side of the baffles and then into the right side of the baffles, it will flow into container E.
The final answer is container E.
